meanings.definition: To turn aside abruptly from a straight line or course
meanings.sent1: The cyclist swerved to avoid the pedestrian on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The airplane swerved to avoid a flock of birds.
meanings.sent3: The cat swerved playfully to chase after the laser pointer.

meanings.sent5: The river swerved sharply around the bend.
